original_text: He has chosen the best part of the land for himself. When Israel's leaders met together, Gad's tribe received the land that a leader deserves. Gad's people obeyed the Lord's good laws. They obeyed the Lord's commands for Israel. He has chosen the best part of the land for himself. When Israel's leaders met together, Gad's tribe received the land that a leader deserves. korean_text: 그가 자기를 위하여 먼저 기업을 택하였으니 곧 입법자의 분깃으로 준비된 것이로다 그가 백성의 수령들과 함께 와서 여호와의 공의와 이스라엘과 세우신 법도를 행하도다

sentences.original_text: He has chosen the best part of the land
Gad's people obeyed the Lord's good laws
sentences.korean_translation: 갓 백성은 주님의 선한 법들을 순종했습니다
